history.heading: 2 'fast wavelength switching functionality';
history.title: 2 'fast wavelength switching functionality';

supplement.heading: Supplement No. 1 to Part 774—The Commerce Control List

breadcrumbs: B. “Test”, “Inspection” and “Production Equipment”
3B993 Specified semiconductor manufacturing equipment as follows (see list of items controls).
Inspection and metrology equipment as follows:
Metrology equipment as follows:

Metrology equipment designed to measure focus or overlay after resist development or after etch on product wafers using image-based overlay or diffraction-based measurements techniques, with an overlay measurement accuracy less (better) than or equal to 0.5 nm having any of the following:
history.text:
2 'fast wavelength switching functionality';
Technical Notes: 1. For the purposes of 3B993.q.2, 3B993.a 'track' is equipment designed for coating and developing photoresist formulated for lithography. 2. For the purposes of 3B993.q.2, 'fast wavelength switching functionality' is defined as having the ability the change the measurement wavelength and acquire a measurement in less than 25 ms.

content.html:
Technical Notes:

1. For the purposes of 3B993.q.2, 3B993.a 'track' is equipment designed for coating and developing photoresist formulated for lithography.

2. For the purposes of 3B993.q.2, 'fast wavelength switching functionality' is defined as having the ability the change the measurement wavelength and acquire a measurement in less than 25 ms.
content.text: Technical Notes: 1. For the purposes of 3B993.q.2, 3B993.a 'track' is equipment designed for coating and developing photoresist formulated for lithography. 2.
